TopicTitle: Crashing in windows? ... This may help

Articles.Content:
I know many of us are experiencing crashing of KSP and I thought I'd share something that seems to help me quite a bit for Windows

Open your task manager, right click on KSP and select 'go to details' (KSP has to be running in order to do this)
Then right click on KSP and change the priority to 'High'

This has helped keep KSP from freezing up or CTDing on me ... Hope this helps
